content: edit a milo crochet along is being hosted you can find all of the details on my website here is pt 1 of the pattern https //curiouspapaya com/blogs/free-pattern/milo-the-monkey-crochet-along-part-1 sign up for my **mailing list** 1 to receive news and exclusive offers -this pattern is featured in amigurumi critters 2 my new crochet book intro meet milo the playful monkey who s always well… monkeying around he enjoys playing pranks on the bigger apes like creating booby traps and snickering at their demise they say that he ll pay for his actions one day… that is if they can ever catch him -measurements 6 5 in x 6 in ~17 cm x ~15 cm if using the prescribed materials -follow me on instagram ** @curiouspapaya 3 ** for the latest updates 1 https //view flodesk com/pages/63d4ba29de520bd60dc33f80 2 https //amzn to/4o0uuai 3 https //www instagram com/curiouspapaya
